parameter.name: apiDomain
parameter.label: Freebox Server Address
parameter.description: The domain to use in place of hardcoded Freebox ip

parameter.name: appToken
parameter.label: Application Token
parameter.description: Token generated by the Freebox server

parameter.name: discoverNetDevice
parameter.label: Network Device Discovery
parameter.description: Enable the discovery of network device things

parameter.name: httpsAvailable
parameter.label: HTTPS Available
parameter.description: Tells if https has been configured on the Freebox

parameter.name: httpsPort
parameter.label: HTTPS port
parameter.description: Port to use for remote https access to the Freebox Api

parameter.name: websocketidletimeout
parameter.label: WebSocket Idle Timeout in Seconds
parameter.description: The WebSocket is the connection to the innogy service that listens to status updates. If no data is received over the websocket connection for the given time, the websocket will reconnect. 0 will disable the idle timeout. Default is 900 seconds (15 minutes).
